text: @senatemajldr As opposed to 'conservative' wish lists that should be in a DOD budget, not a coronavirus package. How does a new FBI building help with Covid 19? At least Democrats put their package on the table 10 weeks ago, you put yours on the table this Monday. Benefits run out Friday
